General.Name: Ningbo Runhe High-Tech Materials Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Ningbo Runhe High-Tech Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of textile chemicals in China and internationally. Its products include silicone fabric finishing agents, non-silicone softeners, pre-treatment agents, dyeing auxiliaries, printing auxiliaries, and waterproofing agents. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Ningbo, China.
